patientDataRequired.title: Patient Data Required
patientDataRequired.description: Please enter patient information first to calculate doses.

regimenSelected.title: Regimen Selected
regimenSelected.description: {{name}} selected. Doses calculated based on patient data.

exportSuccess.title: Export Successful
exportSuccess.description: Dose calculations have been prepared for export.

disclaimer.title: Clinical Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: This application is designed as a clinical decision support tool. All calculations should be verified independently and doses should be reviewed by qualified healthcare professionals before administration. Always consider patient-specific factors, contraindications, and institutional protocols when prescribing chemotherapy.

seo.title: ChemoCalc Pro – Oncology Dose Calculator
seo.description: Calculate oncology doses, premedication, and print clinical chemotherapy protocols.

printableProtocol.footerNote: This protocol is computer-generated and should be reviewed by a qualified healthcare professional before use.

clinicalSheet.subtitle: Clinical Preparation & Administration Guide
clinicalSheet.disclaimer: This treatment protocol is computer-generated and must be reviewed by qualified healthcare professionals. Verify all calculations and dosing before administration. Report any discrepancies immediately.

compactSheet.pevGroups: Premedication and Supportive Prophylaxis - Solvent Administration
compactSheet.name: Name
compactSheet.footer: Computer-generated protocol. Verify all calculations before administration. Document version: {{date}}

meta.noRegimensForFilter: No {{filter}} regimens available for this cancer type.
meta.noResults: No cancer types found matching your search.

doseCalculator.title: Dose Calculations
doseCalculator.clinicalNotesPlaceholder: Add any clinical notes or special instructions...

reminders.title: Important Reminders
items: Verify patient weight and height before administration
Check for any contraindications or drug interactions
Consider dose modifications for organ dysfunction
Generate and review the clinical treatment sheet before proceeding

doseCalculator.emptyState: Select a cancer type and regimen to calculate doses.

toasts.enterCnpBeforeExport: Please enter a CNP before exporting
toasts.enterPatientIdBeforeExport: Please enter a CNP before exporting
toasts.enterCnpBeforePrint: Please enter a CNP before printing
toasts.enterPatientIdBeforePrint: Please enter a CNP before printing
toasts.generateSheetNeedCnp: Please enter a CNP to generate treatment sheet
toasts.generateSheetNeedCalcs: No dose calculations available. Please ensure regimen is selected and patient data is entered.

dialog.overrideDesc: You are about to override a {{severity}} safety alert.{{requiresJustification}}
dialog.placeholder: Enter clinical justification for overriding this alert...

emetogenicRiskClassifier.title: Emetogenic Risk Classification
emetogenicRiskClassifier.description: Assessment of nausea and vomiting risk based on chemotherapy regimen
emetogenicRiskClassifier.guidelinesBody: Classification based on NCCN 2024, ASCO 2020, and MASCC/ESMO 2023 guidelines for antiemetic use in oncology. Risk levels determine appropriate antiemetic prophylaxis strategies.

antiemeticSelector.title: Antiemetic Protocol Selection
antiemeticSelector.description: Evidence-based antiemetic prophylaxis for {{riskLevel}} emetogenic risk regimens

alerts.recommended: Protocols specifically recommended for your current regimen based on evidence-based guidelines.
alerts.none: No specific protocols recommended for this combination. Please review all protocols or select individual agents.

antiemeticSelector.individualHelper: Select individual antiemetic agents to create a custom protocol. Evidence levels: IA (highest), IB, IC, IIA, IIB, IIIA, IIIB (lowest).

validation.weightNaN: Weight must be a valid number
validation.weightMin: Weight must be at least {{min}} kg
validation.pediatricWeight: Pediatric weight detected - verify dosing protocols
validation.highWeight: High weight - consider dose capping for BSA > {{bsaCap}} m²
validation.heightNaN: Height must be a valid number
validation.heightMin: Height must be at least {{min}} cm
validation.ageNaN: Age must be a valid number
validation.pediatricPatient: Pediatric patient - verify dosing protocols and consider pediatric-specific regimens
validation.elderlyPatient: Elderly patient - consider dose reduction and enhanced monitoring
validation.bsaLow: Low BSA detected - verify calculations and consider pediatric protocols
validation.bsaHigh: High BSA detected - consider dose capping at 2.2 m² for some agents
validation.crclSevere: Severe renal impairment - consider dose reduction or nephrotoxic drug avoidance
validation.crclModerateSevere: Moderate-severe renal impairment - dose adjustment may be required
validation.crclMildModerate: Mild-moderate renal impairment - monitor for nephrotoxicity
validation.creatinineNaN: Creatinine must be a valid number
validation.creatinineLow: Unusually low creatinine - verify lab values
validation.creatinineHigh: Severely elevated creatinine - consider nephrology consultation
validation.doseExtremelyLow: {{drug}}: Calculated dose ({{dose}} {{unit}}) is extremely low (< 10% of standard)
validation.doseExceedsMax: {{drug}}: Calculated dose ({{dose}} {{unit}}) exceeds maximum safe limit (200% of standard)
validation.doseHigh: {{drug}}: High dose detected ({{dose}} {{unit}}) - consider dose capping
validation.cisplatinHigh: {{drug}}: High cisplatin dose - ensure adequate hydration and monitoring

premedSelector.quickTip: Quick-select standard protocols based on your chemotherapy drugs
premedSelector.noneSelected: No premedications selected. Use the other tabs to select protocols or individual medications.

unifiedSelector.title: Premedication & Supportive Care Protocol
unifiedSelector.recommendationsDesc: Evidence-based recommendations for {{drugs}} with {{risk}} emetogenic risk.
unifiedSelector.emptySelected: No agents selected. Choose from recommendations or browse categories to build your protocol.
unifiedSelector.selectSolventDesc: Select a solvent for each premedication agent.
unifiedSelector.noAgentsForSolvents: No agents selected. Please select agents from the recommendations or categories tabs first.

cinv.name: Antiemetic Agents for CINV
cinv.description: 5-HT3 RAs, NK1 RAs, corticosteroids, olanzapine for chemotherapy-induced nausea/vomiting

cholinergic.name: Cholinergic Syndrome Management
cholinergic.description: Agents for managing cholinergic symptoms from specific chemotherapy agents

diarrhea.name: Diarrhea Control Agents
diarrhea.description: Management of delayed diarrhea from specific chemotherapy regimens

infusion_reaction.name: Infusion Reaction Prophylaxis
infusion_reaction.description: Prevention of hypersensitivity and infusion reactions

gastroprotection.name: Gastroprotection
gastroprotection.description: Gastric protection when using steroids or gastric irritant chemotherapy

tumor_lysis.name: Tumor Lysis Syndrome Prophylaxis
tumor_lysis.description: Prevention of tumor lysis syndrome in high-risk patients

growth_factors.name: Hematologic Growth Factors
growth_factors.description: Support for bone marrow function and blood cell recovery

nutrition.name: Nutritional and Vitamin Support
nutrition.description: Adjunctive amino acids and vitamins for supportive care

solventGroups.description: Group medications that can be administered in the same solvent bag for more efficient administration.
solventGroups.dropHere: Drop medications here to group them
solventGroups.unassignedHelp: These medications need to be assigned to a group or moved to individual administration.

events.labsDesc: CBC with diff, CMP, assess for toxicity

errors.criticalToastDesc: A critical error occurred in {{context}}. Please reload and report this issue.
errors.criticalCardBody: A critical error occurred that could affect clinical calculations or safety.
errors.criticalCardReload: Please reload the application and report this issue immediately.
errors.componentErrorBody: This component encountered an error and couldn't load properly.
errors.genericComponentLoadFailed: Something went wrong loading this component.
errors.cancerSelectorFailed: Cancer type selector failed to load
